languages.text: {n}Капеллан усмехается. Шрамы на его лице проступают особенно ярко.{/n} "Знаете, почему меня зовут Капелланом? Потому что я был корабельным священником у Денза в его лихие годы".
{n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан усмехается. Шрамы на его лице проступают особенно ярко.{/n} "Знаете, почему меня зовут Капелланом? Потому что я был корабельным священником у Денза в его лихие годы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the ship's priest on Denz's crew in his wilder days."
{n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the ship's priest on Denz's crew in his wilder days."
{n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."
{n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."
{n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

languages.text: {n}牧师笑了起来，脸上的疤痕变得更加明显了。{/n}“你知道为什么他们叫我‘牧师’吗？因为丹兹放荡不羁的那段日子里，我就是他船上的牧师。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师笑了起来，脸上的疤痕变得更加明显了。{/n}“你知道为什么他们叫我‘牧师’吗？因为丹兹放荡不羁的那段日子里，我就是他船上的牧师。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán se ríe. Las cicatrices de su rostro destacan aún más.{/n} «¿Sabe por qué me llaman Capellán? Porque era el sacerdote de la nave de Denz en su época más salvaje».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán se ríe. Las cicatrices de su rostro destacan aún más.{/n} «¿Sabe por qué me llaman Capellán? Porque era el sacerdote de la nave de Denz en su época más salvaje».

languages.text: {n}教戒官はくすくすと笑った。彼の顔の傷痕がよりはっきりと見える。{/n}「私がなぜ教戒官と呼ばれているかご存じですか？デンツが精力的だった頃、私は彼の船に司祭として乗船していたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官はくすくすと笑った。彼の顔の傷痕がよりはっきりと見える。{/n}「私がなぜ教戒官と呼ばれているかご存じですか？デンツが精力的だった頃、私は彼の船に司祭として乗船していたのです」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester kichert. Die Narben auf seinem Gesicht treten noch weiter hervor.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, warum sie mich Ordenspriester nennen? Weil ich der Priester auf Denz' Schiff in seinen wilderen Zeiten war."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester kichert. Die Narben auf seinem Gesicht treten noch weiter hervor.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, warum sie mich Ordenspriester nennen? Weil ich der Priester auf Denz' Schiff in seinen wilderen Zeiten war."

languages.text: {n}Alors que Chapelain pousse un petit rire, les cicatrices qui barrent son visage deviennent encore plus saillantes.{/n} « Savez-vous pourquoi on m'appelle Chapelain ? Parce qu'à l'époque, j'étais prêtre sur le vaisseau de Denz. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que Chapelain pousse un petit rire, les cicatrices qui barrent son visage deviennent encore plus saillantes.{/n} « Savez-vous pourquoi on m'appelle Chapelain ? Parce qu'à l'époque, j'étais prêtre sur le vaisseau de Denz. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz gülüyor. Yüzündeki yara izleri daha da belirginleşiyor.{/n} "Bana niye Papaz derler, biliyor musunuz? Çünkü Denz'in hızlı zamanlarında gemisinde rahiptim."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain chuckles. The scars on his face grow even more prominent.{/n} "Do you know why they call me Chaplain? It's because I was the priest on Denz's ship in his wilder days."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz gülüyor. Yüzündeki yaralar daha da belirginleşiyor.{/n} "Bana neden Papaz dendiğini biliyor musunuz? Çünkü altın çağındayken Denz'in gemisinde rahiptim."
